parameters.name: ShowIt
parameters.description: True to show ExplodeViewName in its exploded state, false to show it in its collapsed state

parameters.name: ExplodeViewName
parameters.description: Name of the explode view to show

title: IPartDoc.ShowExploded
description: Displays the specified explode view for this multibody part.
signature:
System.Boolean ShowExploded( 
   System.Boolean
ShowIt
,
   System.String
ExplodeViewName
)

parameters.name: ShowIt
parameters.description: True to show ExplodeViewName in its exploded state, false to show it in its collapsed state

parameters.name: ExplodeViewName
parameters.description: Name of the explode view to show

returns: True if the explode view displays correctly, false if not
remarks: This method only works with explode views in the current, active configuration.
